metadata.title: RX Family: How to Select a Partner

sections.content:
Question:
How to select a partner company?
Answer:
From "Renesas Ready Partner Network" page, click on the RX Family Partner Ecosystem and you will find the partners categorized by each subcategory. You can select the most suitable partner solution from the category.
Suitable Products
RA Family
RL78 Family
RX Family
